node.title: Fatal car accident in Hawke's Bay, major Auckland road closed after crash
node.description: A person has died following a single vehicle crash in Hawke's Bay.
node.content: ["A person has died following a single vehicle crash in Hawke's Bay Saturday morning.", "Emergency services were called to the scene after a car hit a tree on Waimarama Road, Tuki Tuki about 20km south of Hastings at around 3:30am.", "One person died at the scene.", "The road is closed and diversions are in place.", "Motorists are asked to avoid the area if possible.", "Meanwhile, police are advising motorists in Auckland that Te Atat\u016b Rd is closed at the intersection of Gloria Avenue and Te Atat\u016b Rd, following a single vehicle crash shortly before 6am.", "One person is in a critical condition and the road is expected to be closed for some time.", "RNZ"]
